question: Which of the following was/were the reforms of Sir John Lawrence (Viceroy of India)?
option1: Telegraphy System opened between India and Europe
explanation: In the tenure of Viceroy of India, Sir John Lawrence (1864â€“69), the following reforms took place: Telegraphy System opened between India and Europe, High Courts were established at Calcutta, Bombay and Madras in 1865, expanded canal works and railways; Bhutan War (1865), Advocated State-managed railways, created the Indian Forest Department and recognised the native Judicial service.
